Ingredients.1: 1 small butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

Ingredients.2: 3 medium Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

Ingredients.3: 2 medium red bell peppers, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch pieces

Ingredients.4: 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes

Ingredients.5: 1 medium red onion - peeled, quartered, and separated into pieces

Ingredients.8: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh thyme, or more to taste

Ingredients.10: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C).

Directions.2: Combine butternut squash, Yukon Gold potatoes, bell peppers, sweet potato, and red onion pieces in a large bowl.

Directions.3: Stir olive oil, balsamic vinegar, rosemary, and thyme together in a small bowl; season with salt and pepper. Pour over vegetables and toss until well coated. Transfer vegetables to a large roasting pan and spread in an even layer.

Directions.4: Roast in the preheated oven, stirring every 10 minutes, until vegetables are slightly caramelized and cooked through, 35 to 40 minutes.
